snippet: Shai Agassi leaves Better Place, a company that has won widespread praise and attention for his dream of ending the world’s dependence on oil.
abstract: Shai Agassi steps down as chief executive of Better Place electric vehicle infrastructure company; Agassi, who founded the company five years ago with the ambitious goal of replacing the world's gas pumps with battery-swapping stations for electric cars, will remain on the board of directors.

byline.original: By BRADLEY BERMAN and ZACH McDONALD

lead_paragraph: Shai Agassi leaves Better Place, a company that has won widespread praise and attention for his dream of ending the world’s dependence on oil.

headline.seo: Israeli Electric Car Company’s Chief Steps Down
